name: Motor Vehicle Supplies and New Parts
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of motor vehicle accessories, tools,
equipment, and new parts, including electric vehicle charging
equipment designed for commercial use.
For automotive repair work, use MCC 7531 or 7538 as appropriate.
For electric vehicle charging services, use MCC 5552.
